org.datavec.api.vector

Interface Vectorizer<VECTOR_TYPE>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTfidfVectorizer, TextVectorizer, TfidfVectorizer

    public interface Vectorizer<VECTOR_TYPE>
    Vectorizer of a particular type. Meant for converting individual records to vectors
